passive.name: HEADSHOT
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) HEADSHOT
                                Every 6 attacks fires a Headshot, dealing 29 bonus physical damage (50%  + 125% ).Trapped or netted enemies trigger a Headshot that has double range.Attacking from brush builds Headshot twice as fast.

q.name: (Q) PILTOVER PEACEMAKER
q.description:
(Q) PILTOVER PEACEMAKER
 9/8/7/6s   50/60/70/80 
                                
                                
                                Fires a narrow piercing bullet that deals 133 physical damage (60/110/160/210 + 125/140/155/170% ). Hitting an enemy expands the bullet, but reduces subsequent damage by 40%.Always deal full damage to trapped or netted enemies.

w.name: (W) YORDLE SNAP TRAP
w.description:
(W) YORDLE SNAP TRAP
 0,5s   20 
                                
                                
                                Sets a trap that enemy champions can spring, immobilizing them for 1.5 seconds and Revealing them for a short duration.Traps last for 27/22/17/12 seconds and 2/3/4/5 can be active at once.

e.name: (E) 90 CALIBER NET
e.description:
(E) 90 CALIBER NET
 16/14/12/10s   75 
                                
                                
                                Launches a net, knocking Caitlyn backwards. The net dealsÂ 70 magic damage (70/120/170/220 + 80% ) and slows by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

r.name: (R) ACE IN THE HOLE
r.description:
(R) ACE IN THE HOLE
 65/55/45s   100 
                                
                                
                                Lines up a perfect shot, Revealing an enemy champion for 1.5 seconds before dealing physical damage equal to 200 (200/375/550 + 200% ) plus 20% of their missing Health.Enemy champions can intercept the bullet before it hits their ally.
